description: This file defines a process for generating audio output from an AI agent, saving the audio as a WAV file, and printing transcripts. It sets up an agent with specific audio configurations, runs a prompt, and writes the resulting audio stream to a file while handling decoding errors.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with OpenAI models to generate responses, including audio streams.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class representing an OpenAI chat model with specific configurations.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns an iterator over responses, supporting streaming.
